attributes.action: An e.petition of the Government Deal versus Remaining in the EU.
attributes.background: To help us out of the Impasse of Brexit carry out an e.petition of the Governments Deal versus Remaining in the EU since the Governments great reluctance to hold a Peoples Vote to settle the issue.The result will be Final

rejection.details: E-petitions can be an effective way for people to show they care about an issue, but they aren't a voting mechanism so we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
